fields.Title: DOOMED / MOODBOARD
fields.Description: Fortress Accident's whiteboard. Has three sections: game-related concept art, production schedule and Soona's notes.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "So much pain. Back pain, neck pain,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So much pain. Back pain, neck pain, headaches, carpal tunnel, chest pain... no gym membership can make up for working in this manner.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Just look at those details. So muc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just look at those details. So much effort..."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Everyone is constantly teetering on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Everyone is constantly teetering on the edge of the abyss. An abyss of *production*. These squares look orderly but beneath them is chaos, worry, pain...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "You see primitive oil rigs built in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see primitive oil rigs built into glaciers -- by *boreal dweorg* -- yurts under the snow, great mammoth-like beasts of burden...

fields.Title: You: "Inspect the notes."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inspect the notes.

fields.Title: You: ""Well. This has been educational --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well. This has been educational -- let's move on from the welkins."

fields.Title: You: "Keep reading -- what happened?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep reading -- what happened?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant can't help but comme..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant can't help but comment: "An inordinate amount of time has gone into drawing these little welkin creatures..."

fields.Title: You: "Step back and look at something els..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Step back and look at something else.

fields.Title: You: ""Who *are* these creatures? Who dre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who *are* these creatures? Who drew them? Are they *real*? I have so many questions..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Project Dread Board: "Your eyes glide over four sections..."]
You: "Inspect the photos."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inspect the photos.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Project Dread Board: "Your eyes glide over four sections..."]
You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "Your flashlight slides over an old..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your flashlight slides over an old green chalkboard covered in scribbles, sketches and schemes like some ancient cave mural.

fields.Title: Logic: "Looks like they didn't make it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like they didn't make it.

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "Some of the writing has faded with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Some of the writing has faded with age, but you can still make out sections here and there; photos and drawings have been pinned to the board.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Albeit dark and cold, this vision a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Albeit dark and cold, this vision also feels cosy in its own way. Like eggnog, or morphine! A much needed respite from our own world.

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "These lithe, pointy-eared creatures..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These lithe, pointy-eared creatures appear to be different types of *welkins*. You make out autumnal *candle-welkins* casting wax-based magic...

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "This looks like an *enormous improv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This looks like an *enormous improvement* on the classic Wirrâl setting. Much more *advanced*. Light years ahead.

fields.Title: You: "Inspect the drawings."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inspect the drawings.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Who are all those creatures? Fantas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Who are all those creatures? Fantasies of a tortured, feverish mind?

fields.Title: Empathy: "...and for what? All gone."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...and for what? All gone.

fields.Title: You: "Examine the welkin -- this is impor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Examine the welkin -- this is important.

fields.Title: You: "I don't care -- step back."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't care -- step back.

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "This old green chalkboard is covere..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This old green chalkboard is covered in scribbles, sketches and schemes like some ancient cave mural.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm... political commentary. That..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm... political commentary. That one has a great beard too..." The lieutenant nods at the welkin's facial hair.

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "Entire oceans have been frozen from..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Entire oceans have been frozen from shore to shore. There are pictures of settlements on dried up riverbeds, abandoned in a storm. Animal corpses in the dark, carcasses and bones.

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "The handwriting is only partly legi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The handwriting is only partly legible, but you can still make out three slogans: 'Call in, tune out!', 'WIRRÂL UNTETHERED', and 'Heat death of the Universe'...

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "It looks a bit like an academic cal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It looks a bit like an academic calendar. Only much more *brutal*.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "If they put this much effort into m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If they put this much effort into making welkin cooler, imagine what they did with the dweorg and the humans?

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "This is a monthly calendar from the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is a monthly calendar from the year '50. Cryptic words like 'sprint', 'daily minime', and 'GPI' span the marker-drawn grid -- the grand scheme of production and money.

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "One of the welkins -- towering amon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One of the welkins -- towering among the rest -- appears to be different, however.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "'Minime' stands for a 'mini-meeting..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'Minime' stands for a 'mini-meeting'. It's part of a bigger framework for managing work called R.U.N. Station 41 tried to implement it a few years ago, but failed.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like they didn't make it." T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like they didn't make it." The lieutenant looks at the frigid ice field of nothingness.

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "*Translucent welkins* with organs s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Translucent welkins* with organs shining under their skin, and even aether welkins -- hailing from the vast emptiness of sidereal space.

fields.Title: You: "Inspect the schedule."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inspect the schedule.

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "The photo collage depicts barren, i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The photo collage depicts barren, icy landscapes wrapped in perpetual night. You see permafrost and glacial landforms, dead trees groaning under the snow.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "The full text reads: 'Heat death of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The full text reads: 'Heat death of the Universe is the new black'. Another note says: 'The biggest advancement in role-playing systems since the Thirties'.

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "Your eyes glide over four sections..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your eyes glide over four sections of the imposing green chalkboard...

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "A note in the bottom left corner of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A note in the bottom left corner of the chalkboard says: "SEE THE PROD. SCHEDULE FILAMENT FOR DETAILS."

fields.Title: You: ""Why would anyone spend so much tim..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why would anyone spend so much time on this?"

fields.Title: Variable["doomed.moodboard_read_slogans"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_read_calendar"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_viewed_drawings"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_viewed_photos"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.fireplace_have_read_it"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.doomed_radiocomputer_turned_on"] == true

Variable["doomed.moodboard_read_slogans"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_read_calendar"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_viewed_drawings"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_viewed_photos"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.fireplace_have_read_it"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.doomed_radiocomputer_turned_on"] == true

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["doomed.moodboard_read_slogans"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_read_calendar"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_viewed_drawings"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_viewed_photos"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.fireplace_have_read_it"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.doomed_radiocomputer_turned_on"] == true

fields.Title: !(Variable["doomed.moodboard_read_slogans"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_read_calendar"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_viewed_drawings"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_viewed_photos"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.fireplace_have_read_it"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.doomed_radiocomputer_turned_on"] == true)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (Variable["doomed.moodboard_read_slogans"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_read_calendar"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_viewed_drawings"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.moodboard_viewed_photos"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.fireplace_have_read_it"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.doomed_radiocomputer_turned_on"] == true) == false

fields.Title: Shivers: "Outside, a cold wind wraps the buil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Outside, a cold wind wraps the building in its bosom. Snowflakes in the wind. An old woman passes what the locals call the Doomed Commercial Area. She tries hard not to look at the bookstore windows. It's *unwise*.

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "As time goes on, the numbers in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As time goes on, the numbers in the boxes grow rarer and rarer. The board becomes an empty snowfield in the final days... Only failure and regret dwell in this region.

fields.Title: You: "(Whisper) "One of them is a welkin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Whisper) "One of them is a welkin supremacist."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This looks like *concept art* for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This looks like *concept art* for a project. It's not really real."

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "The huldur, the dweorg, the humans,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The huldur, the dweorg, the humans, and even headless men... all of them. Purged. Imagine a world filled *only* with welkin! Green welkin, dread welkin... and the high welkin to rule them all.

fields.Title: Drama: "You should adopt one of those welki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should adopt one of those welkins as your *persona*. No longer a mere man -- but a welkin...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Some people really *like* building..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some people really *like* building a world, I think. Even if it's just for a game."

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "A pinned postcard reads: 'The heat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A pinned postcard reads: 'The heat death scenario -- a desperate fight for geothermal energy engulfs the world as Wirrâl becomes untethered from its sun, drifting through the Universe.'

fields.Title: Project Dread Board: "It's Vaarahamira, a *high welkin* -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's Vaarahamira, a *high welkin* -- his face white and scarred like cracked marble. This is clearly a welkin supremacist. The note says: 'All non-welkin races will be purged.'
